Package net.royalur

Class Game<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.Game<P,​S,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board.
    S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
    R - The type of rolls that may be made.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleGame
    public class Game<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
extends java.lang.Object
    A game of the Royal Game of Ur. Provides methods to allow the playing of games, and methods to support the retrieval of history about the moves that were made in games that have been played.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game​(RuleSet<P,​S,​R> rules)
      Instantiates a game of the Royal Game of Ur that has not yet had any moves played, and that is played by anonymous players.

      Instantiates a game of the Royal Game of Ur that has not yet had any moves played.

      Instantiates a game of the Royal Game of Ur.

      • getStates

        @Nonnull
public java.util.List<GameState<P,​S,​R>> getStates()
        Retrieves the states that have occurred so far in the game. The last state in the list is the current state of the game.
        Returns:
        The states that have occurred so far in the game.

      • getActionStates

        @Nonnull
public java.util.List<ActionGameState<P,​S,​R>> getActionStates()
        Retrieves the states that represent the actions that have been made so far in the game. The last state in the list represents the last action that was taken in this game.
        Returns:
        The states that represent the actions that have been made so far in the game.

public java.util.List<GameState<P,​S,​R>> getLandmarkStates()

        Returns:
        The states that represent the actions that have been made so far in the game.

        @Nonnull
public PlayableGameState<P,​S,​R> getCurrentPlayableState()

        Parameters:

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove​(@Nonnull
                     Move<P> move)
        Applies the move move to update the state of the game. This does not check whether the move is valid.
        Parameters:
        move - The move to make from the current state of the game.

      • makeMove

                     P piece)
        Moves the piece piece, and updates the state of the game.
        Parameters:

                     Tile tile)
        Moves the piece on tile tile, and updates the state of the game.

      • playAutonomously

        public int playAutonomously​(@Nonnull
                            Agent<P,​S,​R> light,
                            @Nonnull
                            Agent<P,​S,​R> dark)
        Completes this game using the two agents to play its moves.
        Parameters:
        light - The agent to play as the light player.
        dark - The agent to play as the dark player.
        Returns:
        The number of actions that were made by both agents combined. Includes rolls of the dice and moves.

      • builder

        @Nonnull
public static GameBuilder builder()
        Creates a builder to assist in constructing games with custom settings.
        Returns:
        A builder to assist in constructing games with custom settings.

      • createStandard

        @Nonnull
public static SimpleGame createStandard()
        Creates a standard game that follows the default rules on RoyalUr.net. Therefore, this uses the simple rules, the standard board shape, Bell's path, the standard dice, and seven starting pieces per player.
        Returns:
        A standard game.

      • createAseb

        @Nonnull
public static SimpleGame createAseb()
        Creates a game of Aseb. This uses the simple rules, the Aseb board shape, the Aseb paths, the standard dice, and five starting pieces per player.
        Returns:
        A game of Aseb.
